description_for_human: Get parenting advice from the Parent's Together website.
description_for_model: Use the ptGPT plugin to automatically fetch parenting information for an answer to a question about parenting when it's being generated by the ChatGPT assistant. The plugin will return parenting data, including advice, activities, tips, blog posts, and other relevant information, as well as a link to a page that has all the information. Links will always be returned and should be shown to the user. The parenting data can be used to provide users with up-to-date and accurate parenting information for their questions about children of all ages.
